charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Cynthia were
headed back to town after a Pokémon battle. They
came across Darach, who seemed worried.
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1201_0:
Greetings, [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
Lady Cynthia. I was just returning from
grocery shopping.

I had to stop myself from purchasing Lady Caitlin’s
favorite brand of tea. It took all of my strength to
remove it from my cart and return it to the shelf...
You never change, do you, Darach?

As embarrassing as it is to admit, Lady Cynthia,
you are indeed correct—this is my nature.
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_0401_0:
As a butler it’s my sworn duty to look after my
lady, and it’s not as though I have been forbidden
from buying tea, but... *sigh*
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_0402_1:
It is extremely difficult to break oneself of habits
that one has developed over many years... *sigh*
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1201_1:
Lady Caitlin has been doing more and more for
herself since she arrived here on Pasio.

I’ve done my utmost to keep my distance and
refrain from performing tasks that she hasn’t asked
of me.

It is for that reason that I have not been
purchasing her favorite tea...

*chuckle* Your situation reminds me of your
partner Pokémon, Staraptor.

When a Staravia evolves into a Staraptor, it
leaves the flock to live alone.

I see. You’re saying Lady Caitlin has grown. That
it is time for her to “leave the nest,” so to speak.

And yet, I must admit that thinking about the
situation in such terms makes me feel
quite lonely...
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_0401_1:
I am grateful. I suppose you could say that where
one door closes, another opens.
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_0402_2: Thank you. That does make me feel rather better.
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1201_2:
Lady Caitlin has made many new, wonderful
friends like you since she came to Pasio.

It’s a complicated feeling, to be unable to tend to
my lady when she needs my help.

I have a favor to ask you. If it’s not too much
trouble, could you please continue to be Lady
Caitlin’s friend, now and into the future?
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_0402_2:
Of course. I suppose I needn’t have asked you to
do that which you already intended.
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1201_2: Do you feel a bit better now?
charaepi_ch0159_00_kokuran_a/2301_1201_3:
Yes. I will do everything I can not to be too
overprotective and anxious about Lady Caitlin.

It’s just...I’m the only one who truly understands
my lady’s taste in tea. Surely I could be forgiven
for making just one purchase...

Oh, dear. It’s never easy watching a fledgling
leave the nest.
This might take a bit more time.
